Bugs:

NTH:
    Code:
        Cultural choice at char creation
        Cultural feats

    New World Map ?
    More armors (lol...)

Debug:
    - Troops incorrect culture in cities
        Notables in culture@notable_and_wanderer_templates must be of the troops culture, city culture is not used for that
    - Sequence contains no matching element
        For notables, merchants needs caravan_master of the same culture in culture+elite_caravan_party_template
    - Same face troops/face always set to BodyPropertiesMin or BodyPropertiesMax
        Check if BodyPropertiesMin and BodyPropertiesMax are different, carefull about the c/p and the simple "<BodyProperties version="4..."
        BodyPropertiesMin and BodyPropertiesMax must be "wide" enough or else it won't differ a lot
